ygData.subject: Off Topic - Brewers Protest March
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings my fellow Bards, Faeelin is organizing a Brewers Protest March on the Fennin Ro server.  The plan is to meet on the East Freeport Docks on Saturday
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings my fellow Bards,

Faeelin is organizing a Brewers Protest March on
the Fennin Ro server. The plan is to meet on the
East Freeport Docks on Saturday at 10:00pm Eastern
time. If you are not on Fenin Ro, like me, create a
character using the same name you now use, providing
it is available. Meet us there and we will begin our
protest with petitions to GMs, shouts in the zone,
etc. The protest will then move to other zones to
bring our plight to the people of Norrath.

If you see the Roleplaying value of a viable Brewing
trade, and can see the benefit of a working and
beneficial Alchohol Tollerance skill, then please come
out in support of this cause. For what is a Bard without
a good Brew, a good fire and an audiance to hear his
tales.

Thank you,

Ethric Gildenfire - Bard of Qeynos
Xegony

"Joy is in the ears that hear." - Saltheart Foamfollower
